comment: Indexed union of intersection. Generalization of half of theorem "Distributive laws" in [Enderton] p. 30. Use ~ uniiun to recover Enderton's theorem. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2004.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2020.)
